name: Mario Block Simulator
description:
Description: This was a small project that I made in 2 Weeks to challenge myself and to test assets(with a few days to fix some itch.io bugs) back in 2021. I hope you enjoy it and Nintendo please don't sue me.

Controls: 

WASD to Move

Space to Jump

Left Shift to Sprint

Esc to Reset

Playtime: 3-5 Minutes(unless you get a bug)

Current Bugs:

The last Block doesn't make sound

Playing on Firefox gives a weird mouse drift(If anyone knows how to fix it please send me a message or comment down below)
